mapper.select: select h.apt_code, h.build_year, h.road_name, h.road_name_bonbun, h.road_name_seq, h.road_name_basement_code, h.road_name_code, h.dong, h.bubun, h.sigungu_code, h.eubmyundong_code, h.dong_code, h.land_code, h.apartment_name, h.jibun, h.lon, h.lat, h.view_cnt, h.like_cnt from houseinfo h join dongcode d on h.dong_code = d.dong_code where d.sido_name like concat('%', #{sidoName}, '%') and d.gugun_name like concat('%', #{gugunName}, '%') and d.dong_name like concat('%', #{dongName}, '%') and h.apartment_name like concat('%', #{aptName}, '%');
select * from houseinfo where apartment_name like concat('%', #{aptName}, '%')
